attributes.action: Leave our pound alone!!, we dont want the Euro!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If we sit back and do nothing then we will lose our pound our identity and everything we have left that is British...
The president of the European Commission, Jose Manuel Barroso said...
"I'm not going to break the confidentiality of certain conversations, but some British politicians have already told me, 'If we had the euro, we would have been better off'. "

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
